title: They may stop providing the service at any time

tosdr.case: They may stop providing the service at any time
tosdr.tldr: The Customer Agreement (EEA) states: "22.1 We will try to make sure our Services are available to you when you need them. However, we do not guarantee that our Services will always be available or be uninterrupted. We may suspend, withdraw, discontinue or change all or any part of our Service without notice."
